verses.verse: Do not rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with exultation <S%H1524><s%> like the nations! <S%H5971><s%> For you have played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> forsaking <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You have loved <S%H157><s%> [harlots'] earnings <S%H868><s%> on every <S%H3605><s%> threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor. <S%H1637><s%>
Threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor <S%H1637><s%> and wine <S%H3342><s%> press <S%H3342><s%> will not feed <S%H7462><s%> them, And the new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> will fail <S%H3584><s%> them.

They will not remain <S%H3427><s%> in the Lord's land, <S%H776><s%> But Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And in Assyria <S%H804><s%> they will eat <S%H398><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> [food.]

They will not pour <S%H5258><s%> out libations <S%H5258><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> will not please <S%H6149><s%> Him. [Their bread <S%H3899><s%> will be] like mourners' bread; <S%H3899><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> who eat <S%H398><s%> of it will be defiled, <S%H2930><s%> For their bread will be for themselves <S%H5315><s%> [alone]; It will not enter <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> will you do <S%H6213><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the appointed <S%H4150><s%> festival <S%H4150><s%> And on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

For behold, <S%H2009><s%> they will go <S%H1980><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of destruction; <S%H7701><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will gather <S%H6908><s%> them up, Memphis <S%H4644><s%> will bury <S%H6912><s%> them. Weeds <S%H7057><s%> will take <S%H3423><s%> over <S%H3423><s%> their treasures <S%H4261><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> Thorns <S%H2336><s%> [will be] in their tents. <S%H168><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> of punishment <S%H6486><s%> have come, <S%H935><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> of retribution <S%H7966><s%> have come; <S%H935><s%> Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> [this]! The prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a fool, <S%H191><s%> The inspired <S%H7307><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is demented, <S%H7696><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> of the grossness <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And [because] your hostility <S%H4895><s%> is [so] great. <S%H7227><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> [was] a watchman <S%H6822><s%> with my God, <S%H430><s%> a prophet; <S%H5030><s%> [Yet] the snare <S%H6341><s%> of a bird <S%H3352><s%> catcher <S%H3352><s%> is in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> [And] there is [only] hostility <S%H4895><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his God. <S%H430><s%>

They have gone <S%H6009><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> in depravity <S%H7843><s%> As in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> He will remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> He will punish <S%H6485><s%> their sins. <S%H9128><s%>

I found <S%H4672><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like grapes <S%H6025><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> your forefathers as the earliest <S%H1><s%> fruit <S%H1063><s%> on the fig <S%H1063><s%> tree <S%H8384><s%> in its first <S%H8384><s%> [season.] [But] they came <S%H7225><s%> to Baal-peor and devoted <S%H935><s%> themselves to shame, <S%H5144><s%> And they became <S%H1322><s%> as detestable <S%H1961><s%> as that which <S%H8251><s%> they loved. <S%H159><s%>

As for Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> their glory <S%H9202><s%> will fly <S%H5774><s%> away <S%H5774><s%> like a bird <S%H5775><s%> – No <S%H4480><s%> birth, <S%H3205><s%> no <S%H4480><s%> pregnancy, <S%H990><s%> and no <S%H4480><s%> conception! <S%H2032><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> they bring <S%H1431><s%> up their children, <S%H1121><s%> Yet I will bereave <S%H7921><s%> them until not a man <S%H120><s%> is left. Yes, <S%H3588><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> to them indeed <S%H1571><s%> when I depart <S%H5493><s%> from them!

Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> as I have seen, <S%H7200><s%> Is planted <S%H8362><s%> in a pleasant meadow <S%H5116><s%> like Tyre; <S%H6865><s%> But Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will bring <S%H3318><s%> out his children <S%H1121><s%> for slaughter. <S%H2026><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> – what <S%H4100><s%> wilt Thou give <S%H5414><s%>? Give <S%H5414><s%> them a miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> and dry <S%H6784><s%> breasts. <S%H7699><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> their evil <S%H9567><s%> is at Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> I came to hate <S%H8130><s%> them there! <S%H8033><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their deeds <S%H4611><s%> I will drive <S%H1644><s%> them out of My house! <S%H1004><s%> I will love <S%H157><s%> them no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H3254><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> their princes <S%H8269><s%> are rebels. <S%H5637><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is stricken, <S%H5221><s%> their root <S%H8328><s%> is dried <S%H3001><s%> up, They will bear <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H1097><s%> fruit. <S%H6529><s%> Even <S%H1571><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they bear <S%H3205><s%> children, I will slay <S%H4191><s%> the precious <S%H4261><s%> ones <S%H4261><s%> of their womb. <S%H990><s%>

My God <S%H430><s%> will cast <S%H3988><s%> them away <S%H3988><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> they have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to Him; And they will be wanderers <S%H5074><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
